sections.heading: Felonies; recognizance; amount; endorsement on warrant
sections.text: The clerk issuing a warrant on such an indictment shall endorse thereon the sum in which the recognizance of the accused was ordered as aforesaid to be taken.SourceG.S.1873, c. 58, ยง 431, p. 820;R.S.1913, ยง 9075;C.S.1922, ยง 10099;C.S.1929, ยง 29-
